University_Courses.Course Details: Our BSc Adult Nursing course has been designed to contribute towards achieving the following United Nations Sustainable Development Goals
University_Courses.Entry Requirement: Applicants must be 18 years old by the 2nd month of commencing pre-registration nursing programmes and all applicants must have 10 years of consecutive education
University_Courses.Fees and Funding: UK-  Full Time: £9,250, International, Full Time: £17,250
